attributes.action: scrap plans for spying road tax system and simply put fuel charges up.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let's move away from spying, that is in this case discrediting a potentially useful measure, and towards an unambiguous move towards environmental taxation.  Revenue to be invested in public transport infrastructure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
